overview: New insights into Michael Vick and O.J. Simpson, what it really means to be "ghetto," insane family members and impossible-to-please mothers are all on the menu of this comedy feast, recorded live at Los Angeles's Classic Comedy Connection. Host Alex Thomas presides over a rib-tickling lineup that includes hilarious up-and-comers James Hannah, Joey Wells, Esau McGraw, Mystro Clark, Deon Cole and more.
title: Next Up
